website_summaries.verdict: It has the basics you need in an LED shop light, as well as a lower price. The one to get if you'rere on a budget.
pros: An affordable, lightweight model that's easy to install
cons: Some owners say it emits a bit of heat
It turns on and off with a switch instead of a pull chain, which some find inconvenient

customer_reviews.title: Review of Led Shoplight
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! I use on the wire rack shelving for growing plants. Great intensity. Easy to set up just wrapping the wire connectors around the edge of the shelving unit. I like there is an off/on switch button on the long cord so you can shut it off that way or on the outlet where I have 5 plugged in. If you need higher lumens consider: HyperSelect Utility LED Shop Light. The shelves I use for plant growing are; Space+ Adjustable 5 Tier Wire Shelving Rack Heavy Duty Chrome Steel Shelf,L48'' X H82'' X W18''
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Beverin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I almost went with a different model because this one had so few reviews, but you should know this one is totally satisfactory. My Kill-A-Watt meter says it draws 37 watts rather than 36, but that's close enough for me. In my estimation it is a little bit brighter than the old 80 watt fluorescent fixture I replaced and it is extremely lightweight, so if you wanted to be able to move it around to different spots, that would be very easy. It's totally silent as well, another improvement over the fluorescent.
customer_reviews.author: Chris O.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for to replace my garage lighting.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to replace my garage lighting. Very easy to install as I already had an electrical socket from the old florescent garage light. Just plug in! A noticeable difference in brightness as it illuminates our two-car garage very well. Product comes with two wires (as in picture) to hang the light up. Cord is about 4 feet and going LED will definitely save on electricity bills as it draws only 36 watts. (as stated in product info) For the price, I can't complain and recommend this product to anyone wanting to upgrade to LED lighting or a replacement overhead light.
customer_reviews.author: MauiBoi59

customer_reviews.title: Great bright light, poor product design.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't understand the review about the glass breaking and the plastic clips not being strong enough to hold the light up, but I totally understand now. When I turned on the light I noticed the cracked internal glass, but the lights still worked, so I figured they were still functional even with a broken glass and I could still use them . The plastic clips in back of the light broke during installation because the plastic is too thin . Luckily, the lights still work. Poor quality case - plastic is too thin Poor product design. Would not recommend. Seller should not sell this poorly designed product until the plastic case is redesigned and reinforced.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The cord is fairly short, so I had to splice on extra cord to reach my outlet. I guess an extension cord would have worked, but I didn't want the extra plugs. There were some strange marks like cracks on one end, which I looked at carefully and decided were only cosmetic. I kept it rather than going through the hassle of return... after all, it's in my garage. The light is bright and unit is lightweight enough to be easy to install. All in all, I'm happy with it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Chalchiuhtlicue

customer_reviews.title: The light output is very good and the price I paid was great
customer_reviews.text: The light output is very good and the price I paid was great, but only giving this 3 stars because when I surface mounted the first one the plastic keyhole slot broke within the first minute of it being installed. Fortunately I had looped the cord over the rafter in the garage so it didn't fall all the way to the floor and shatter. I ended up using zip ties to secure these to the rafters to make sure there aren't any more plastic failures. They are really light weight so I've no concern with the zip ties holding them, but future buyers should beware that the plastic housing is not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, Bright LED
customer_reviews.text: Man, do I love be this light! It comes with basic mounting material and only took me 10 minutes to mount in my basement above the washing machine. It plugs into a regular outlet and the on/off switch is on that cord. As you can see in the attached picture, it's fairly bright and does a fantastic job lighting up the area.
customer_reviews.author: Wathan48

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighting Option! (For a few months...)
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: June 2019 Less than 4 months after putting these lights up in my basement, they have both stopped working! They were fine for a while, but now both have apparently burned out with less than 4 months of use, and since I can't change the bulbs in them, they're now useless. Pretty expensive for a lot fixture that needs to be replaced after only 4 months. ==== Original February 2019 Super light-weight. Incredibly bright, white light. (Makes the other lights in my basement look dim and yellow, when they seemed bright enough before!) Easy to hang and work perfect right out of the box. Will definitely be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Petty

customer_reviews.title: Best Lighting Choice!!
customer_reviews.text: W.O.W I can finally see inside of my garage! Wonderful product! We replaced older ..heavy...constantly burning up bulb ballasts that hung from chains in our garage. I installed these by myself, all 4 of them in 15mins. They are PLUG IN LIGHTS, extremely light weight, led BULBS INCLUDED, toggle switch on the electrical cord. Very, very bright. 4 car garage, 4 of these lights and it's like daytime in there. Don't hesitate to buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Elysian

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, great lighting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one set as a test and it's fantastic. There are colors in my basement that I've never noticed before. It's almost like the sun is shining. There are multiple installation formats, I used the screw hooks and hanging wire and I was done within 10 minutes (5 minutes were used moving the light to a better location). I'm getting three more to replace other light fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried given the price of this unit. But I am very happy with the product . I did drop one and although it did break the glass on the inside it didn't break the plastic coating on the lamp. That is worth a lot as I hate cleaning up broken glass. The light is nice and bright. I will be buying more and will repost if anything happens in the future of note.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I liked about these when I saw them is they didn't have those shades covering 1/2 the light to cast a huge shadow on the ceiling & upper wall of the room. These lit up the ceiling, walls & everything very nice. They were simple to hang up, especially if you have a helper. My only minor gripe is I wish the cord was a few feet longer, especially at the price they were at, I thought the cord should've been longer. Other than that, very happy with the light.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light to use for my own little home gym and it works very well. Plenty of lighting, easy set up, has its own hanging cables and switch. I am giving it 4 stars because it seems very easy to break. Be very careful handling this unit as the plastic seems to be a brittle as other reviews have mentioned. For the price I feel it is a good purchase and will do the job you need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: LKO8419

customer_reviews.title: Just put it up = EASY and light, no pun intended.
customer_reviews.text: Just put it up = EASY and light, no pun intended. Also No fear of breaking a glass tube. I've always hated fluorescent shop lights because of the potential pain of changing bulbs. A flawed design from the get go. 2 pins aligned 4 feet away from each other in glass under pressure. And my tube seems to blow sooner than later. I hope this light last for years as LEDs tend to do. Just ordered 3 more
customer_reviews.author: A. Eban Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Great but be careful with the plastic connector when mounting
customer_reviews.text: This light is fantastic! Would be a 5 star but the mounting plastic broke while I was hanging it. I used zip ties to hang instead. It Provides great and even light. Also has a pleasant color (not too blue not too yellow!) it's changed my garage from dim and a hard place to work to a great spot for evening projects. Highly recommend... Just be cautious if using the provided mounting holes.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: Took around 15 minuits to hang in my shop. Love it brite light and a snap to install. Sorry to say left it in the box for the last couple of days becuse i dont like installing lights. Wow was easy. Looks good and does the job. I will be buying these in the future .
customer_reviews.author: Russell Wagner

customer_reviews.title: These lights are not super high quality look pretty cheap
customer_reviews.text: These lights are not super high quality look pretty cheap, but they work very well. I bought two to replace the lights in our basement laundry/storage/utility room when the florescent fixture fails. I believe these will do an excellent job. I have been hanging them on the wall in the garage and they work excellent. The tubes are pretty cheap plastic feeling and the ends aren't any better, but the light is very even and fairly bright (typical shop light)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job Quite Well. No Complaints.
customer_reviews.text: This light does the job and does it well. We have florescent strip lights in the basement, and wanted to replace them with LED versions. I ordered a couple of these to try, and am happy with them. The light is bright, outshining the fluorescents easily. Each unit is also light, making mounting easier and making me not worry about the old mounting hardware we still use from the fluorescents.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love This Light!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright and efficient light. I have it hooked up to a motion detector for our garage so I never have to walk into a dark space again. It pops right on and doesn't put off much heat at all. Simply to install and includes all necessary hardware to flush mount or hang mount. Love this light and would recommend this to anyone looking to light up a dark space with an extremely crisp and bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Bobzero101

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. The plastic mounting slot on one end of the second one I put up snapped off. Just wrapped the chain through the fixture end to hold it. Very brittle plastic in the end caps. They throw out a lot of evenly-distributed light. Just hope the other mounting slots don’t crack, Still not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Slash-2CPU

customer_reviews.title: Fixed a minor problem and happy overall
customer_reviews.text: This unit is literally a bare bones fixture but with a bare bones price too! More light than a standard two bulb fixture and easy to mount with the parts provided. Bought 3 and had a problem with 1. I pried the switch apart and found a broken wire and bad solder job. I corrected this with an in line lamp switch which I think cost about $3. Still happy though.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Geek

customer_reviews.title: Bright! Shipping, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted flush on the wall in the garage to replace a double- tube old school fluorescent shop light. The light output is awesome, daylight tones and not so much blue. Product arrived promptly... however, the sockets located at the plug end were cracked in 2 places and the tube on that end was wobbly. While mounting I could hear small pieces of glass inside the tube rattling around. I'm guessing it left the origin okay, and the final shipper may have just launched this on my front porch upon delivery today. Seems like a great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steve_NEOhio

customer_reviews.title: When God said " let there be light " this is what She was talking about!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, these lamps (six of them) are the best buys I have made all year. It makes my shop look like the roof is missing on a cloudless day at high noon. Instant on, no heat and no flickering or buzzing. The best part is they are as light as a feather and the switch is in the right spot, so you have total control of power input.
customer_reviews.author: Blacky

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Simple setup
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Simple setup. The hanging wires clip into place onto plastic cutouts on top. No hooks are provided though to hang the looped wire section. It's very light weight and can be held with 1 hand to install. A reflector would have made this a bit nicer as there is a bit of spill upward from the sides. The core could be a little longer too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: i purchased this light a month ago and it no ...
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this light a month ago and it no longer works. Aside from this, it has a major defect, the on/ off switch is located next to the bulbs so if you place it high up, it is impossible to reach to turn of and on. Spare yourself the trouble and order a different work light.
customer_reviews.author: Viva

customer_reviews.title: These are super bright and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Already had plugs in my garage ceiling so was looking for LED light strips with cords. As other reviewers have said, you can not disassemble to wire direct to junction box. These are super bright and light weight. Got 4000K as 5000K to blue for my tastes. Just drilled through shade to mount to seiling with screws. Nice feature is wide angle light dispersion.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Best shop lights I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best shop lights I have ever had, I have 2 pair over my work bench in the garage, covers the 8 foot workbench very well, very bright with no glare. Perfect if you are working on any project. Will buy more and replace the florescent fixtures on the garage ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous CT Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! A lot of light out of this little guy!
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned that this light wasn't bright enough for the space I was going to use it in. Opened the box, plugged it into a wall outlet, and hit the switch.... and was blinded! :-) Wow, this little light puts out a lot of.... well, light! Planning to purchase 6 more for my workshop. Very happy with this purchase. Easy to hang, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Andy W.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a gold smith and do intricate pieces and stone setting fir which I need good light. This unit was way more than I ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a unit I could plug in rather than being hardwired. I'm a gold smith and do intricate pieces and stone setting fir which I need good light. This unit was way more than I expected, it is so bright it is blinding, that is a good thing. It has taken some getting used to. This would be perfect fir over a pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Southard Purdue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light and price...!
customer_reviews.text: just EXCELLENT...!!! light weight--can hold with two fingers! but solid, NOT cheap/crappy excellent brightness, much above the big tube fluorescent it replaced; will definitely be ordering more. Two friends ordered based on my call to them, and they also love them.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Easy to install & lightweight. Switch in cord makes it a perfect workshop light. Doesn't flicker. Bought it a second time.
customer_reviews.author: sandiego girl

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough one to rate. The lights do work. And they are as bright as I expected. But there are a few things about them that leaves me a little disappointed. They are cheap, and it shows. They seem very fragile. The location of the switch on the power cord seems odd to me. It is nearer the fixture. So you have to reach up to the light to us the switch. I thought it would be in the middle or near the plug.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio War Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Poor Build Quality, but Good Lighting
customer_reviews.text: The lights are a great price, and provide light as advertised. Unfortunately the mounting tabs are horrible. After mounting I have had 2 fall off the ceiling because the tabs failed, and I had to screw in zip ties to hold it to the ceiling. Excellent functioning but poor build quality. Unfortunately I am stuck with them, so I have to order 2 more since I purchased 10 of them, and would like the ones in the workshop to match.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Reynard

customer_reviews.title: Nice but arrived with cracks, still functions and kept it and like it.
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is super nice and bright and light and I love that about it. It arrived w/ cracks in the plastic "tubes" and ends. Not enough to call it broken or affect the workings, but should have been better protected. I didn't want to hassle with returning it and hung it up in the shed. I'm happy to have a nice bright bench light.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I bought the wrong one
customer_reviews.text: It's simply not very bright and with the on/off switch built into the power cord you need a ladder to turn it on and off. It hangs down about 6 inches from the garage ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walker

customer_reviews.title: Flickers
customer_reviews.text: Hi quality LED lamps don’t flicker when are recorded on high speed camera. This does.l and it causes eye fatigue. Too fragile to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality?
customer_reviews.text: Lasted until today, Feb 21, 2018. All led, thought these were supposed to last 50,000 hours. Not even 20 hours. I understand these have a 5 year warranty, contact me to send the old one back and I will change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good lights and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased 2 more, for a total of 5 in my shop. I purchased the original 3 about 3 years ago and have had no issues. They're very bright and cost effective. I recommend this product for any easy light installation.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shop light, bright light, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely, well packaged, in good condition. This unit gives off really good light, day light bright. Looks a bit cheap, but it functions well, and was easy to install, I have no complaints, and am pleased with the product. Will probably buy several more.
customer_reviews.author: rubyranch

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a plug in and on/off switch; I converted to wired to use in my kitchen. Works well - is a "warm" LED set (2) paired LED lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure light, packaged perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These lights are both beautiful and functional. Minimalist perfection akin to the classic Martini or a man's Tuxedo. Simple to install, they plug in and work right out of the box. This is pure 4000K light, packaged like a piece of art! Like them so much I've ordered another bunch to light up my new garage.
customer_reviews.author: MrBill

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy, bright!
customer_reviews.text: I combined this with a screw-in outlet adapter to replace a standard light bulb in my basement. It was easy to hang and it's so bright!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Great lights while working but one had early failure.
customer_reviews.text: One arrived with a heavily cracked but still worked fine, other had one tube fail after just a few days. Great while they worked though. I don't blame company for the shipping problem but I do for the tube failure. I still would consider these and hope failure was a one-off, - physical design is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ...and then magic happens..

customer_reviews.title: good weight and bright
customer_reviews.text: VERY BRIGHT as needed....used screw in hooks to allow for very little damage to the ceiling so the light weight of the light was perfect. also love the plastic in stead of glass for the bulb. i'm clumsy and guarantee at some point I'll drop this light ....I cant wait to use for making YOUTUBE videos could hang from the ceiling
customer_reviews.author: ladyjas82

customer_reviews.title: Bright and efficient
customer_reviews.text: These are super easy and inexpensive replacements for old florescent fixtures. Very bright
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: we have all kinds of shop lights installed this one ...
customer_reviews.text: we have all kinds of shop lights installed this one is our fav because it does not have the reflector it lights up the ceiling and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Ugly Moe

customer_reviews.title: Works great in canopy! Hung in minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my garage and I liked it so much I bought 2 more for the carport/canopy I'm using to cover a boat I'm restoring. The wire loop attachment allowed me to loop around the top pole of the canopy and easily hang these within minutes. Two of these lights has the area lit up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kin Shijei

customer_reviews.title: Incrediblly Powerful 360Degree Illumination
customer_reviews.text: Powerful illumination on both sides. Light in weight. Heavy in illumination. . Small footprint. Probably only negative aspect is that it's a consumable No way to replace bulbs. But who cares!!!???
customer_reviews.author: Peanutbutter

customer_reviews.title: The greatest light n price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first one n the light is awesome ive since bought 4 more. They're brighter than florescent cheaper in cost.you have to love them.Im gonna be purchasing more did my whole basement no im doing my attic.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: flush mount plastic is garbage, otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: nice light, plenty bright. everything is great except the flush mount plastic being far too thin and brittle as other reviews mentioned. both broke instantly for me, and I had to fashion up a ghetto workaround.
customer_reviews.author: glass n3rd

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST $28 I EVER SPENT. I REPLACED AN OLD FLORESCENT BULB STYLE LIGHT THAT WEIGHED ABOUT 50 POUNDS. This thing is light and BRIGHT! I am ordering more! If you need light in your shop or dimply lit basement-this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dee

customer_reviews.title: remarkably bright.  remarkably light weight
customer_reviews.text: these fixtures are a real upgrade from old school flourescent shop light fixtures. about 1/4 the weight and no need to change bulbs every year or two. so easy to mount, being light. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ross

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, bright, simple!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these as replacements for some old fluorescent shop lights in my garage. Both were located near ceiling plugs that are controlled by a wall switch. They were easy to install (hang the cables from some screws, slide them into the light, plug it in), they're bright, and they use less electricity per fixture than my old ones did per bulb! So far, I'm thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: goodcindy123

customer_reviews.title: I have pictures if you would like. Please let me know how to proceed with ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE. Contacted LUCECO customer service and warranty was honored is a very quick fashion. Customer service was really top notch."I bought a LUCECO 3600 Lumen LED Shoplight march 6th and half of the light has stopped working. I have pictures if you would like. Please let me know how to proceed with a replacement."
customer_reviews.author: Trag

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation near existing ceiling outlet.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right amount of light for laundry area in basement. Mounted it on leftover lumber (1/2" thick) then drilled holes to line up with overhead joists for final attachment. A mercury-free replacement for older fluorescent tube fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Flash G

customer_reviews.title: decent light
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is what you expect for an LED shop light. However, note that the light is shipped in a very long, skinny box. The first one arrived bent in half. Amazingly, the light still turned on, but there was no structure integrity (the glass tubes were broken) so it had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great shoplight option
customer_reviews.text: Works great - very bright. Two easily illuminate my two-car garage. Easy to install with included hanging cables & then direct plug-in to my existing ceramic fixture. I like these much better than the fluorescent-tube shop lights they replaced.
customer_reviews.author: FirstTools

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The switch on this product is really cheap and flimsy (extremely lightweight plastic housing). Mine would only work if I jiggled the switch around and even then all I could get was a flickering on and off of the LEDs. Definitely test out your lamp before installing it or just don't buy this product until they replace the switch with something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: margaret n.

customer_reviews.title: but the plastic used for the mounting piece on the light itself was super cheap and brittle
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a defective one, but the plastic used for the mounting piece on the light itself was super cheap and brittle. Both sides broke almost immediately while I was trying to install. The light itself was quite bright but its useless now since I cannot mount it
customer_reviews.author: Whitney B.

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Super bright and high quality. I bought 2 sets with a motion sensor for my clothes closest and Hall closet. Super bright and I love them. Easy to hang my contractor knocked them a few times and hit the floor they cracked and one went out and came back but it works again. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: The light is bright, lightweight, economical and easy to install. In less than 15 minutes, the dark area in my shop was bright again. This lamp easily outshines the lame fluorescent fixtures that will eventually be replaced by more of these. LED's are definitely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gulledge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fluorescent fixture replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Great light. I am using it as a replacement for a fluorescent fixture in a storage building; got tired of changing bulbs and ballast. I is nice to have a room full of light with no ballast hum, in all kinds of weather.
customer_reviews.author: L. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: Came complete with screws and hangers. Take it from someone who isn’t handy, I had mind up in 5 minutes,
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Baker

customer_reviews.title: The light itself works fine but if you use screws to hang it
customer_reviews.text: The light itself works fine but if you use screws to hang it, the plastic is much to thin to support the light. Mine lasted less than 3 days. I did glue some thin wood pieces, after cutting out the slot, and that is working fine. For me, it wasn't a big problem because I like to work on things but for someone who doesn't want that hassle, spend a little more and get something a little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Piepmeier

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright LED lite
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright LED lite. I put two of these in my 2 car garage, and it lights up the front of the garage wonderfully. They are really light- I thought I would need a strong hanger, but simple drywall anchors come with it and they hold great.
customer_reviews.author: Viggenator

customer_reviews.title: lots of light
customer_reviews.text: The fixture emits lots of light. One problem I had is the slots for the hanging cables are not very strong. Had to use hooks from older replaced lamps
customer_reviews.author: P. V. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang! Just enough brightness for the basement. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright :)
customer_reviews.text: This light works great in the garage. It is super bright. I wish the on/off switch was closer to the plug so i don't have to constantly plug/unplug it. Since I can't reach it at the ceiling height, I used a remote switch to do this instead.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome for the price. I bought four for a 6X12 enclosed cargo trailer/RV conversion. Two were enough to light it up brilliantly. I will go ahead and use the other two anyway. Can always use one outside, and the other will be in reserve. Very slim and utilitarian, but tough compared to a flourescent!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Power switch is in the wrong spot
customer_reviews.text: Nice light for my garage but the dang switch is on the wrong side of the cord.
customer_reviews.author: stacy hinton

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for the shop
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for the shop, cause this sucker is BRIGHT. Quick install, works like it should, not complicated. Love that the switch can be right over the workstation.
customer_reviews.author: Windfall71

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wow, didn't know what to expect but these work awesome. Replaced 3 four foot fluorescent fixtures and it was a big difference. More of a yellowish light compared to the fluorescents. On instantly, smooth light. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Price

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with lens already cracked
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic light cover is very flimsy at the ends and arrived already broken. Definitely does not appear to be a product manufactured to be durable and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: gchasen

customer_reviews.title: Bright and efficient
customer_reviews.text: These lights are small, bright and efficient. I replaced the fluorescent lights in my mom's laundry room with one of these and she loves it. I will be replacing the incandescent lights in my garage with these.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Lights are great until you bonk them with something
customer_reviews.text: Lights are great until you bonk them with something. The plastic tubes are very brittle. I had one light slip out of my hand and tap the ground and the entire length of the tube spider webbed with cracks.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap. It's about as simple as it gets to hang it and plug it in. Good light. It was everything I wanted to light up our work bench in the garage and did I say it was cheap and easy?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but not too bad. Seems to be made pretty cheaply
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a single stall garage. Thought it would produce more light being LED, but not too bad. Seems to be made pretty cheaply. Time will tell how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Cox

customer_reviews.title: and I'm glad I ordered them
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Never thought I would write a rave review, but if you are even cautiously contemplating replacing your old flourescent (yeah, sorry, I can't figure out how to spell it...) bulbs, then Get These! Just as birght; weight les than a pound, and I'm glad I ordered them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light shop light that packs a punch for it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice light shop light that packs a punch for it's size. I use two in my basement and they work very well. After three months one unit had one side of it's LED's go out. A contact to the manufacturer resulted in them promptly helping me out...great customer service. Thanks Luceco!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfen

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of these and they work perfectly for starting seedlings indoors
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 4 of these now. 2 for my garage ceiling and just added a second to my cargo trailer. Very bright and easy to install. I am thinking about adding a 3rd in my garage, over the work bench. So far, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tsyvrud

customer_reviews.title: Great lights in the basement workshop.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced some basement work shop florescent lights with these and am very happy. Instant on, no humming, excellent light output and color temperature. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ferrante

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised, bright, light weight, easy to install. Seems like 2 of these are brighter then my old 8 foot fluorescent light.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: These provide the light where I need it.
customer_reviews.text: This light is helping out in a number of dark areas. The light is not too bright, but gives plenty of light. I may be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: pema drolma

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I needed to light up an area of the garage where other lights were blocked. This product was light, easy to install and bright. The price was much less than the LED installed several years earlier by an electrician. Great product and easy install with the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Drop in replacement for old flourescents.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace some old flourescent shoplights that had outlived their usefulness. Hung from the same hooks, plugged into same outlets and voila! Better light, less energy cost, less weight.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line product and so easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I am a elderly handicap lady who needed NO help putting this lamp up. Bright and light weight. I f needed to replace another fixture I will buy again. Top of the line product and so easy to handle. Best purchase I have made in a long time. Fast shipping also.
customer_reviews.author: sharon graefe

customer_reviews.title: the bad thing about this light is that it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: the bad thing about this light is that it is a throw away. when the bulbs burn out or you break one by accident you cannot replace them. will not by again.
customer_reviews.author: Reed A Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bright, fast starting with no flickering. Mounted to ceiling joists in basement. You have to be careful if directly mounting using only screws. mounts are sensitive and break easy.
customer_reviews.author: Albert D.

customer_reviews.title: ... use this in my work shop and it is perfect. I like the low profile of this light ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my work shop and it is perfect. I like the low profile of this light as I have it installed under a cabinet and it does not hand down very much.
customer_reviews.author: Al_scv

customer_reviews.title: Bright, light, durable with crappy hanging system
customer_reviews.text: Great lighting and seem durable and light weight. Downside is the hanging system on these lights are cheap and already broke on one unit. Fortunately a person can easily hang the light using other methods.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R. Katzmarek

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LIGHT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This light is great, very bight and hangs nice, it does have a switch built into the cord and the switch is only about a foot from the light itself. I wish it was closer to the plug end but I made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesmcfar112

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I used two of these in the two bulb light fixture in my garage with a light socket adapter. I didn't realize how bad my lighting had been before. My garage is 16'x24' and I can even see things in what used to be the dark corners. Best of all, it uses less electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Parker R

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bright enough but when we received it one end was off and wires were disconnected! My husband had to rewire. Next time I would spend a little more and purchase a better quality light.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Super bright and very light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Super bright! Used it during camping to light up the cooking tent. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consider me impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with these lights. They are much slimmer and lightweight than I expected, but yet they are quite durable and very bright. Had them up and running in minutes. Will definitely be buying more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lights. I put two of them in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lights. I put two of them in the garage and they do a great job. Extremely bright and great quality. The cables they come with for mounting are nice additions and not cheesy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy hook up
customer_reviews.text: Great light. So much brighter than regular tube bulbs. Super easy hook up. Took 2 mins to hook up and that included finding a spot to set the light up. Will be buying more to replace all my lights in the basement and garage
customer_reviews.author: Kim Chenez

customer_reviews.title: good light
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO MOUNT GREAT LIGHT LIKED IT SO MUCH THAT I'VE ALREADY ORDERED ANOTHER ONE.
customer_reviews.author: alice landis

customer_reviews.title: One arrived cracked
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two....one came in cracked....the other came in great condition and works great. Very easy to install....very bright light.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: Luceco LED Shop Light for Garages, Work Areas and Shops (1-Pack)
product_meta.description: Size:1-PackLED Shop Light for Garages, Work Areas and Shops (1-Pack)
feature_bullets: ✅ SUPER BRIGHT - Bring your garage or work bench the best lighting possible with an incredible 4000 lumens of cool white light. Illuminate large areas, garages, barns, storage rooms, warehouses, and workshops with this utility shop light.

✅ MULTIPLE MOUNTING OPTIONS - Install this 4 foot shop light as flush mount or a hanging light fixture with adjustable height. The innovative cable hardware included with each light allows for versatile installation applications. Assembly is a breeze!
✅ LINKABLE UP TO 8 FIXTURES - Includes 5 Ft Plug in Cord, 3 Ft mounting chains and an on/off pull chain.
✅ 24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT & HASSLE-FREE WARRANTY - Superior’s five-year unlimited warranty means we’ve got you covered! Contact us for an easy and fast replacement.

✅ SAVE ENERGY INSTANTLY - Integrated LEDs means no bulbs to change and instant energy savings of up to 60%. Once the lights are installed, you are free from the maintenance for another 45,000h of use! - ENERGY STAR RATED

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars449 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
